project.name: MiAICo - Agentic CoDev Companionship Platform
project.description: A React application designed to function as a collaborative environment where human developers and specialized AI agents work together.
philosophy: Agentic Collaboration: Multiple AI agents with unique roles assist the user and each other.
SpecLang Centricity: Natural Language Specifications (SpecLang) serve as the primary medium for capturing intent.
Iterative & Transparent Workflow: The platform supports a clear, step-by-step workflow with transparent handoffs between agents.
Extensibility & Modularity: The architecture is designed to support future growth with new agents and tools.

features.name: Initial Idea Analysis
features.description: The Workspace agent performs a preliminary AI analysis on the user's concept, creating a richer context for downstream agents.

features.name: NL-to-SpecLang Generation
features.description: Converts natural language into a structured SpecLang document.

features.name: SpecLang-to-Development Plan Generation
features.description: Creates a detailed, actionable development plan from a SpecLang document.

features.name: AI-Powered File Implementation
features.description: Generates and revises file content based on plan actions and user feedback.

features.name: UI Component Ideation
features.description: Generates structured ideas for UI components from a SpecLang document.

features.name: Image & Diagram Generation
features.description: Creates artistic images and technical diagrams from text prompts.

features.name: Spec-to-Conceptual UI Mapping
features.description: Visualizes a SpecLang document as an abstract UI tree structure.

features.name: Syntax and Logic Validation
features.description: Provides feedback on the structure, logic, and clarity of code or text.

features.name: Session Management
features.description: Allows saving and loading of the entire application state, including agent memory and artifacts.

features.name: SpecLang Reverse-Engineering
features.description: Allows Mia to perform a deeper analysis of the current session context to produce a more detailed SpecLang document.

features.name: Git Integration
features.description: Provides a UI for committing changes and creating pull requests.

workflows.name: Core Feature Development Loop
workflows.description: The primary user journey from conceptualization to planning, implementation, and completion.
steps: User conceptualizes an idea in the Workspace, which performs an initial analysis.
Mia generates a SpecLang document from the analysis, then a Development Plan.
Aetherial implements files from the plan based on user selection.
User marks files as complete, returning to Mia's plan to continue.

roadmapSummary: Formalizing a Plugin/Extension API for new agents and tools
Creating a machine-readable Ledger System for agent learning
